features: Dual Wireless Microphones for iPhone and Android: Harness the power of the Wireless Lavalier Microphone, enabling seamless dual-video recording while boasting the prowess of 2.4G wireless transmission technology, guaranteeing unwavering signal stability, formidable anti-interference capability, and lightning-fast transmission speed. For individuals immersed in the realm of video recording, this exceptional product proves irresistibly coveted!

360° Sound Reception & Noise Cancellation: Experience superior audio recording with the built-in omnidirectional pickup chip and upgraded intelligent noise reduction chip. This innovative technology effectively eliminates unwanted noise, ensuring a pristine recording quality. our advanced features will capture clear audio in a 360-degree range. Trust in our solid automatic synchronization technology to provide you with high-quality audio recordings.

Easy Auto-Connect: Effortless Plug and Play Setup, Enhance your recording efficiency with a single click pairing, no need for Bluetooth or any app. Instantly start using it by simply plugging in, reducing setup time and optimizing recording efficiency. The advanced version of our wireless lapel microphone is compatible with iPhone, Android cameras, and computers,making online meetings and remote video conversations a breeze.

Rechargeable Transmitter and Receiver: Equipped with a built-in 320mAh super capacity battery and a low power consumption chip, this device offers an impressive 6-hour working time. Say goodbye to the fear of battery drainage and interruptions during video recording. Moreover,the receiver conveniently draws power from the device itself and can be charged simultaneously.

Experience Unparalleled Versatility with Dual Wireless Lavalier Microphones: Unleash the potential of our upgraded 3-in-1 microphone, elevating your audio experience to new heights. Effortlessly attach the receiver to your collar or waist, liberating your hands for a seamless and unencumbered performance. Perfectly tailored for interviews, captivating video blogging, professional online meetings, immersive group events, and captivating multi-person live streaming.

Hassle-Free Service Experience -We take immense pride in our craftsmanship and attention to detail, which sets our wireless microphone apart from the rest. To further demonstrate our commitment to excellence, we offer a comprehensive 12-month warranty for ALL IMAXTOP enthusiasts. Rest assured that if you encounter any concerns or issues regarding the quality of our products, our dedicated team is here to assist you promptly and diligently.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page IMAXTOP wireless microphone utilizes advanced sound capturing technology to accurately capture the speaker's voice while effectively reducing ambient noise interference.The lapel microphone is designed with precision and portability, making it easy to clip onto collars or ties without burdening you.

3 in 1 wireless lavalier microphone is designed to automatically enter pairing mode on its initial power-on. This means that you don't have to go through any complicated setup process or manually pair the microphone with the receiver.

Please note that: For Oppo/Vivo/Oneplus or some other Andriod phones those have OTG function please enter your phone setting to open this function,here are the specific steps: Settings > Sound & vibration > Other settings > Default recorder > Use peripheral device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to set up and use.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the IMAXTOP Wireless Lavalier Microphone, and overall, I've found it to be a user-friendly and effective tool for my needs. The setup process was straightforward, and I appreciated the simplicity of use. Connecting to my devices was a breeze, and the wireless feature added a level of convenience to my recording setup.However, where the IMAXTOP falls slightly short for me is in the sound quality. While it certainly gets the job done, I was hoping for a richer bass experience. The audio output doesn't quite match the level of depth and warmth that I expected, especially in the lower frequencies. This aspect left me a tad disappointed, particularly as I had high hopes for a more immersive sound.That being said, the microphone's overall performance is commendable. It captures clear and crisp audio, making it suitable for a variety of applications. Whether recording interviews, podcasts, or presentations, the IMAXTOP Wireless Lavalier Microphone proves to be a reliable companion.In conclusion, while the sound quality might not fully meet my bass expectations, the IMAXTOP remains a good product with its easy setup, user-friendly interface, and overall functionality. It's a versatile option for those seeking a wireless lavalier microphone, and with a few improvements in the bass department, it could easily become an excellent choice for a broader range of users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, great audio!
reviews.reviewText: The device worked well, and had no issues with connectivity. I only wish there was a way to minimize the amount of prongs sticking out of the receiver. However, it’s also a great feature to have to quickly swap from one vice to another.Highly recommend for sleek interview audio and on the go “must have” video equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for- easy Bluetooth setup though
reviews.reviewText: Just wanted to try this out and see if this could work for video recording. I had a cheap desktop mic I used a long time ago for my computer that had way better sound quality than these. But that's really all you can expect for under $30. Definitely easy to setup and use-- they worked flawlessly as soon as I turned them on. Very convenient having wireless capability and two lapel mics. However, the information in the description certainly hypes up and exaggerates how good the sound quality is. Sound is clear, but easily peaks and the quality of the sound is not great at all-- it's like talking on a cellphone over a cheap Bluetooth mic in your car. If that's all you need, or for Zoom or Teams meetings, then I would recommend this for ease of use. But I cannot recommend for anything regarding video production where the actual QUALITY of the sound is important.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Listen to the quality comparison yourself in my video
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I can't express how thrilled I am with this wireless clip-on microphone! It's been an absolute game-changer for my live streaming, TikTok, and voiceover projects. Here's why I give it a solid 5 stars:1. **Effortless Setup**: The setup couldn't be simpler – it's truly plug and play. I had it up and running within seconds, which is a huge time-saver when you're eager to start creating content.2. **Exceptional Sound Quality**: The sound quality is simply outstanding. My voice comes through crystal clear, and it even manages to cancel out pesky background noise. Take a listen yourself in my video when I compared the iPhone mic with this wireless microphone.3. **Versatile Compatibility**: I love that it's compatible with charging my phone while in use. The type C port in the receiver is a thoughtful addition, and the package includes all the necessary cables. This ensures I never run out of battery during my recording sessions.Overall, this wireless microphone has become an indispensable tool in my content creation arsenal. It's reliable, delivers top-notch audio quality, and offers the convenience of charging while in use. If you're serious about creating high-quality content, this microphone is an absolute must-have!

I recently purchased this wireless Lavalier microphone kit, and I am thoroughly impressed! The kit includes two microphones, a transmitter, and a short charging cable - everything needed for a seamless audio experience. I've used it in big rooms and outdoors, and it never loses signal. Plus, it's so easy to set up – literally just plug in and start talking. It looks sleek and has survived a few drops, so it's definitely sturdy. The battery life is a winner too; it lasts forever on a single charge. If you need a solid, hassle-free mic, this is the one to get. Totally worth it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Transformative Audio Experience with IMAXTOP Wireless Mic
reviews.reviewText: As a content creator constantly on the lookout for high-quality audio solutions, the IMAXTOP Wireless Lavalier Microphone has been a phenomenal find. The dual-microphone setup is a real game-changer, especially for my video projects that require simultaneous recording. The 2.4G wireless transmission is incredibly reliable, offering both speed and stability, which is crucial during live streaming or outdoor shoots.The 360° sound reception and noise cancellation are standout features. I've recorded in various environments, from busy streets to windy outdoors, and the microphone's ability to capture clear sound while reducing background noise is impressive. It's evident that the omnidirectional pickup chip and the noise reduction technology are of top-notch quality.One of the biggest conveniences is the easy auto-connect feature. The plug-and-play setup saves so much time, making it ideal for quick recording sessions or impromptu interviews. The compatibility with multiple devices like iPhones, Androids, and cameras has made it my go-to microphone for different types of recordings.The rechargeable transmitter and receiver with a 6-hour battery life is a lifesaver, especially during long recording sessions. I appreciate not having to worry about battery drainage in the middle of a shoot. Also, the ability to charge the receiver simultaneously with the device is a thoughtful design aspect.The versatility of this microphone is unparalleled. Whether it's for professional interviews, vlogging, online meetings, or group events, the quality of audio it captures is consistently outstanding. The comfort and ease of attaching the receiver to my collar are just cherries on top.Lastly, the customer service and the 12-month warranty offered by IMAXTOP are commendable. It's reassuring to know that there's reliable support available should any issue arise.In summary, the IMAXTOP Wireless Lavalier Microphone is a top-tier audio recording tool that I highly recommend. It has elevated the quality of my content significantly and has proven to be an invaluable asset in my audio equipment arsenal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing Mic! 5 Stars All the Way!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Wireless Lavalier Microphone, and it has exceeded my expectations! The sound quality is exceptional, providing clear and crisp audio. The wireless range is impressive, allowing me to move freely without any signal drops. The compact design and easy setup make it convenient for any user. The battery life is excellent, ensuring uninterrupted recording sessions. Overall, a top-notch product that deserves a solid 5-star rating!

I used my computer and phone to recall some teaching materials before. I've seen so many videos people have these little mic. So I want a try. This product is amazing. Nice sound and easy to use. Battery last long and no noise! Adaptable to different devices. I feel like I finally found a precious. Now my recording are much better and more professional. Hahah

The IMAXTOP Dual Lavalier Microphone Kit is an exceptional choice for anyone in need of superior sound quality and effortless device integration. This kit is not just a microphone set; it's a comprehensive solution for diverse recording needs.A key highlight is its wide-ranging device adaptability. Effortlessly connecting with various smartphones and computers, this kit removes the hassle of interface or cable switching. It's an ideal pick for creators who frequently switch between gadgets.The endurance of this microphone kit is impressive. The microphones, equipped with a robust battery, coupled with a power-packed charging case, offer extended recording times. This long-lasting performance is crucial for uninterrupted sessions.The audio quality is simply outstanding. Equipped with advanced sound-capturing capabilities, these microphones ensure that every recording is crisp and clear, even amidst distracting background noises. This feature is invaluable for outdoor recordings or in bustling environments.Its plug-and-play functionality is a significant time-saver. The absence of Bluetooth or app requirements for setup means you can start recording almost immediately. This feature is particularly beneficial for those who value efficiency and quick setup times.The freedom of movement offered by these microphones is a major plus. The extended wireless range allows for flexible movement without sacrificing sound quality. This mobility is perfect for active recording environments, be it interviews, live shows, or on-the-go vlogging.Overall, the IMAXTOP Dual Lavalier Microphone Kit is a standout choice for its device compatibility, long battery life, superior sound quality, easy setup, and wireless flexibility.
